amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to national goals for geothermal production and site identification.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3001 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3001 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
